metadata.title: CVE-2017-16545 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The ReadWPGImage function in coders/wpg.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 does notproperly validate colormapped images, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (ImportIndexQuantumType invalid write andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via amalformed WPG image.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
